description: Complete system overview documenting the well data preprocessing system architecture, key components, and their interactions
Detailed documentation of well data structures, including LAS header information, DepthValidationResult dataclass, and well_datasets mapping schemas
Comprehensive documentation of depth validation algorithms, error classification systems, and validation feedback mechanisms
Documentation of the state management system, including state cleanup procedures, data flow between components, and multiwell data handling
Technical documentation of the visualization system architecture, memory management patterns, and figure registry implementation
